articles.author: LINDSAY WHITEHURST Associated Press
articles.title: Forest ecologist helps refashion Barbie dolls as scientists
articles.description: After her daughter asked for a Barbie, University of Utah forest ecologist Nalini Nadkarni decided to re-fashion the iconic dolls as a scientist-explorer in rubber boots rather than high heels
articles.content:
SALT LAKE CITY -- 
When Nalini Nadkarni was a kid, shed run home from school, climb into one of the eight maple trees in her parents backyard and spend an afternoon there with an apple and a book. 
That time in the treetops set the tone for the rest of her … [+3337 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Nicaragua frees some protesters, including Belgian
articles.description: Several activists arrested in Nicaragua in November for taking water to protesters have been freed, including a Belgian dual-national woman
articles.content:
MEXICO CITY -- 
Several activists arrested in Nicaragua in November for taking water to protesters were freed Monday, including a Belgian dual-national. 
Relatives and business leaders confirmed the release of several of the activists, and other confirmed t… [+732 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Paris bakery blast caused by gas pipe break, probe shows
articles.description: French investigators have found evidence that a deadly explosion at a Paris bakery almost a year ago was caused by a gas pipe break
articles.content:
PARIS -- 
French investigators have confirmed that a powerful explosion at a bakery in Paris that killed four people and injured dozens almost a year ago was caused by a gas pipe break, authorities said Monday. 
The Jan. 12, 2019 blast devastated a street i… [+594 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: South Carolina to rent out former Turner family beach house
articles.description: Guests will soon be able to rent a beach house that once belonged to billionaire Ted Turner's family on a private South Carolina island
articles.content:
ST. PHILLIPS ISLAND, S.C. -- 
Guests will soon be able to rent a beach house that once belonged to billionaire Ted Turner's family on a private South Carolina island, state officials say.

articles.title: Pending homes sales rebound in November
articles.description: Americans signed more contracts to purchase homes in November, indicating that the housing market is still strong
articles.content:
WASHINGTON -- 
Americans signed more contracts to purchase homes in November, bouncing back from last month's decline, indicating that the housing market is still strong.
